results.description: Plaza Foods zoekt een Accountmanager te Nijmegen HBO geplaatst op 04-06-2017 Who are we? Plaza Foods is a a subsidiary of Europe's largest oriental restaurant complex: Orient Plaza and was founded in 1994 by the brothers Chang. In our manufacturing facility in Wijchen we use traditional cooking methods in a modern production under the strict standards of BRC and IFS higher level.
